channel.title: Make my portal members only, and how to make people members
channel.description:
I have a members only area, how can I make a portal for members only people. How do I promote kiddies to members.
-won
I'm a newbie editer.

item.title: Make my portal members only, and how to make people members
item.dc:creator: @imantai imantai
item.description:
@imantai wrote:

im not sure but try

f(objectID == 7324 && playerismember>= 1){ teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; sendMessage("You Teleport To The Member Area.");

item.description:
@gigo556556 wrote:

fate2811:

go into char files and change the ismember from 0 to 1

not ismember, change playerrights

It’s wrong coded, try to paste this instead:

if(objectID == 7324 && playerRights >= 1){ teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; sendMessage("You Teleport To The Member Area."); }

item.title: Make my portal members only, and how to make people members
item.dc:creator: @gigo556556 gigo556556
item.description:
@gigo556556 wrote:

Add this in client.java

if(objectID == 7324 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ actionInterval = 7500; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; sendMessage("You Teleport To The Member Area."); }

Then search for makeGlobalObject(

add this under that:

makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, 7324, 0, 10); // member portal

Read full topic
